title: This is what we pay for as Indians, Not a witch hunt but for awareness and entertainment.
selftext:
[https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1871521191](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1871521191)  


Sorry about the longform video. I appreciate and truly thank you for taking time out of your day to view it. I did contact customer care who very quickly dismissed my complaint and said they'd "look into it". I understand that there are way more pressing issues plaguing the country but I rarely post. Please consider watching what I had to say from the bottom of my heart about people who exploit "made in India" sentiments to deliver absolute dogshit and ruin fellow countrymen.   


I thank you for your patience and I hope you got a moments worth of entertainment even if you don't sympathize with my argument. Thank you!
comments:
Don't buy Indian products especially if they are very cheap compared to alternatives and for daily usage. The worst part is most of it is probably made in China and sold with Made in India tag at an extra charge. At least China sells for cheap while India will try to scam for extra money.   
   
Try to get a refund. Make a video on youtube and post the issue on Twitter too.
This is disgusting but honestly man it's your own fault for trusting some crap off Amazon. I'm sorry for you! Hope you're able to rise up from this and come back.
This is absolutely disgusting but it comes down to you trusting some crap on amazon. I sincerely hope you rise above it but obviously try your luck on twitter or some other platforms.
